subject: Steroids
Decisions and Verdicts
Perjury
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: The former pitcher Roger Clemens was found not guilty Monday of lying to Congress in 2008 when he said he never used steroids or human growth hormone in his baseball career.
snippet: The former pitcher Roger Clemens was found not guilty Monday of lying to Congress in 2008 when he said he never used steroids or human growth hormone in his baseball career.
